EmailTemplate.subject: Receiving SREC Payments Via Automatic Deposit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Dear {!SREC__c.Name_From_RE__c} ,
Thanks for your participation in the BlueWave Solar Loan program. You can expect to see your next Solar Renewable Energy Credit (SREC) payment over the next few weeks. If you would like to have your funds deposited directly into your bank account, please provide your deposit information here. If you do not provide bank details by May 31, 2017 we will mail a paper check to the address we have on file.
Sincerely, BlueWave Customer Care customercare@bluewavesolar.com 844.786.4100
